attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that irregular transactions such as on real-estate justify ongoing VAT registration. So similarly should be considered to sell a life story. As such all expenses incurred to develop life whose story may be sold as a property development should be permitted as claimable VAT inputs. Effectively all bona-fide expenses with receipts should attract VAT refunds.
There is an advantage to this to highlight transactions in some unaccountable black economy
